title: Max Bailey (rugby league)
text:
Max Bailey (3 February 1997) is a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a for the <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Sydney Roosters</a> in the <a href="National%20Rugby%20League">National Rugby League</a> (NRL).
Career.
2020.
Bailey made his first grade debut in round 13 of the <a href="2020%20NRL%20season">2020 NRL season</a> for the <a href="Sydney%20Roosters">Sydney Roosters</a> against the <a href="St%20George%20Illawarra%20Dragons">St George Illawarra Dragons</a>.
